Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Indiana
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted WB: 63rd, Prairie, 60th, Michigan, and 63rd; EB: 63rd, State, 61st, Prairie, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to, street blockage near 63rd/Indiana.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Prairie, 60th, Michigan, and 63rd. 

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, State, 61st, Prairie, and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Conservatory-Central Park Drive
ShortDescription: Correction: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Conservatory-Central Park Drive due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Correction: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Conservatory-Central Park Drive due to a sick customer. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
